abstract: Charlie Rose and Gayle King will lead a top-to-bottom reboot of “The Early Show,” CBS News announced Tuesday.
snippet: Charlie Rose and Gayle King will lead a top-to-bottom reboot of “The Early Show,” CBS News announced Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: 1:35 p.m. | Updated CBS News on Tuesday announced a top-to-bottom reboot of “The Early Show,” its long-suffering morning news broadcast, with Charlie Rose and Gayle King at the helm. The moves will take effect in January.

headline.main: Charlie Rose and Gayle King Join ‘The Early Show’ on CBS
